title: Prawn Cocktail
ingredients: ['1 crisp lettuce', '200g shelled prawns', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'Sauce', '100g mayonnaise', '20g tomato ketchup', '2 tablespoons Worcester sauce (to taste)', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'Garnish', '1 lemon', '4 whole prawns', '1 teaspoon paprika']
